skills.title: Front-End
skills.description:
Using the knowledge of HTML and CSS learned at school, 
I developed a variety of websites, ranging from simple web pages to a personal portfolio. 
Through this, I built a solid foundation in web structure and styling. Later, I utilized React to develop a Tech Website and personal portfolio projects, gaining experience in applying component-based architecture and state management. 

I focused on creating user-friendly UI and implementing responsive designs, which significantly enhanced my practical web development skills.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description:
Building on my academic foundation and practical experience, I have developed proficiency in back-end technologies. During my time as a Robotics Developer, I worked on integrating robotic systems with in-house software using C#. 

I handled data communication between robots and our system and used Redis to store and retrieve robot data, improving system performance through caching. 

In my academic projects, I worked with Java, MySQL, and OracleDB, which helped me understand database design, SQL queries, and backend logic. Recently, I expanded my skills by learning Node.js and exploring MongoDB to build RESTful APIs and lightweight back-end services. By combining these technologies, I have a strong grasp of developing scalable and maintainable server-side systems, with an emphasis on efficient data management and integration with front-end applications.

skills.title: Hardware
skills.description:
I have hands-on experience with AGV (Automated Guided Vehicles), AMR (Autonomous Mobile Robots), and Aircraft systems. My work involved integrating and troubleshooting power supply systems, handling electrical components, and performing sensor installations and soldering.

 I am familiar with using tools like multimeters for diagnostics, and I have experience with MQTT protocol for real-time data communication between devices, ensuring efficient and reliable system performance.
